properties.name: urx.language
properties.description: Defines the language in which the default URX properties will reply | Define el lenguaje en el que contestaran las propiedades predeterminadas de URX

properties.name: urx.security.enable-graphql
properties.description: If you are using a graphql api this property defines the special security configuration so that it is validated in the same way as a REST api | Si se esta usando una api graphql esta propiedad define la configuraci√≥n de seguridad especial para que se valide de la misma manera que una api REST

properties.name: urx.security.permit-requests
properties.description: This property defines which paths are not to be considered for security | Esta propiedad define que paths no se van a considerar para la seguridad
